question: Who has been elected as the new chairman of the Indian Banks Association (IBA)?
explanation: Sunil Mehta, the MD &chief executive of  Punjab National Bank (PNB), has been elected as the new chairman of the Indian Banks Association (IBA) for 2018-19. Apart from him, Dinabandhu Mohapatra, MD & CEO of Bank of India (BoI), has been elected as IBAâ€™s Deputy Chairman. The IBA is a representative body of management of banking in India and has its headquarters in Mumbai.
